text: Motion
Motion

Oh, Producer!
This is perfect timing!

Hey, Natsuha.
What's up?

I was jogging earlier, and I stumbled upon
an old bus stop.
It has such a nice atmosphere...
Look, this!

Oh, that's really nice. There's something
appealing about that retro vibe, right?

Exactly! But, you know, that's not the only
amazing thing about it. Can you guess?

Well...
is it perhaps that the timetable has been updated?

That's it!
Apparently, this bus stop is still in use!

I even checked the route map,
but the final destination is a place I've never heard of.

Being taken by bus all the way to the distant end...
I wonder what kind of scenery awaits.

Hmm, it's quite far away, isn't it?
It might be some remote wilderness or something.

That sounds wonderful, a wilderness!
I'd love to go!
Haha, you're really enthusiastic about this.
Hehe, yeah...

...Somehow, I admire it.
Places you've never seen before, far away...

...You can go.
With you, Natsuha, you can go anywhere...

Hehe, that's true.
Because... you're with me.
